testimonials.getSummary: “I’ve always had a keen interest in Beauty Therapy . . . in fact I started painting nails before I could properly speak!”
“I felt inspired to start my own business and I have never looked back.”
“I felt inspired to start my own business and I have never looked back.”
“I felt inspired to start my own business and I have never looked back.”

paragraph.text: You know you want more. You have a vision for your business. You just don’t seem to have the time to achieve it.
When you’re too busy, it’s difficult to get the headspace required to put your plans into action.
That’s why we start by giving you back your time.
We hunt out the quick wins, make sure your systems and processes are running as efficiently as possible, and give you back those all-important minutes & hours.
This gives you the time to start your journey to bigger and better things!
You can have all the time in the world, but if you don’t have the money to invest in your business, it won’t be going anywhere fast.
With CRC as your external business partner, we’ll identify the key drivers behind the finances of your business.
You’ll have a clear and manageable plan that nails down the main actions and targets to ensure your business gets on track, and stays there.
Step by step, you’ll start generating the cash needed to move your business forward, and giving you the financial freedom you desire!
Once the money’s in place, then it’s time to invest!
We believe that your people are the most important part of your business.
Once you’re equipped with extra time and extra cash, we’re going to help you uncover your team’s potential.
It’s only by creating fulfilment in the day-to-day work that you can have a team of people who love their work, and help create something far better than you could ever have imagined alone!
Investing in the individuals around you, you’ll grow a strong team of highly involved, highly engaged people ready to build a business your competitors will be envious of.
